Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Class Animation is for the animation of game objects.
    Background
    Class Background is for drawing background image while main character is moving forward or backward.
    Boss
    Class Boss is for managing behavior of the boss.
    Bullet
    Class Bullet is to store the status and behavior of a bullet in the game.
    Character
    Abstract class Character is to regulates possible statues and behaviors of a any character in the game.
    Coin
    Class Coin represents coin objects during gameplay.
    EatPeopleFlower
    Class EatPeopleFlower defines properties and regulates behaviors of eating people flower.
    Enemy
    Abstract class Enemy regulates general behavior of any types of enemies, namely Mushroom, eat people flower and the boss
    FireBall
    Class FireBomb manages the fire ball ejected from the player.
    FireBomb
    Class FireBomb manages the fire bomb ejected from the boss.
    Game
    Class Game is for game initialization.
    GameObject
    Abstract Class GameObject handles all the gaming objects, namely player character, enemy, fireBall, coin.
    GameOverScene
    Class GameOverScene is scene shown when player is dead.
    GameWindow
    Class GameWindow is inherited from Canvas, which help to defines window sizes and draw background image.
    HelpScene
    Class HelpScene shows help instruction for player.
    HighScoreScene
    Class HighScoreScene shows the game scene of score board.
    Level1
    Class Level1 is the first stage of the game, organising all location of different objects like enemies, coins and player.
    Map
    Class Map is for generating the whole map of the level from Resource.
    MenuScene
    Class MenuScene dedicate for main menu scene.
    MultimediaHelper
    Class MultimediaHelper assists for getting image or music file.
    Mushroom
    Class Mushroom defines properties and regulates behaviors of fast moving mushroom enemy.
    Player
    Class Player defines all properties and all regulates behaviors of user-control player character.
    Scene
    Abstract class Scene regulate all behavior of its children
    SceneManager
    Class SceneManager is for managing different scene of game.
    Score
    Class Score manage score of the player in every game play.
    ScoreSystem
    Class ScoreSystem aims at creating, reading and writing score history file.
    Tile
    Class Tile is for defining tile object property.
    WinScene
    Class WinScene is scene shown when player has won the final boss.
